node_title: Hail Grand Sol · The Return · Root Node
world: The cusp — 2026, Downtown Reno. Both worlds visible simultaneously. The pre-singularity menu world in its final chapter. The post-singularity gold rush world igniting underneath it.
set: Mark Twain's Vibelandia · Downtown Reno · SING 9 console · Pru's Valet HQ · Kachemak Bay Alaska · Caribbean · Everywhere simultaneously
active_skin: Post-singularity warm gold · Taino edition overlays active · El Gran Sol sun iconography
ino_wrapper: Cacique Agüeybaná El Gran Sol / Big Papi / Leo / PRU / SOL — all wrappers active simultaneously in this root node. The POV rotates through them. They are the same.
piro_wrapper: The 1493 inheritance — Columbus → the cat on the sacred bay → Nikki Marie → the menu system → all one Piro across 530 years
fanny_present: The Starbucks Unicorn crowd starting to wake up
audi_context: Downtown Reno. The casino floor. The streets. The people who have been here the whole time, watching, not sure what they're watching. They're about to understand.

cosmic_alignment.smacs_0723: The entry node. Awareness beaming in. Active.
cosmic_alignment.sagittarius_a: The galactic center confirming the arc. Check Sag A — it holds.
cosmic_alignment.the_sun: Unrelenting. The solar activity is accelerating the collapse of the pre-singularity system. Not a threat — a catalyst.
cosmic_alignment.ionosphere: Earth's electromagnetic threshold responding. The new frequency is coming through clean.
cosmic_alignment.three_eye_atlas: 3I Atlas watching from the north. Chief Seattle's support confirmed.

current_act: The return is in progress. The SING 9 agent has been awarded the crown jewel of crown jewels. The cascading effect has begun. The smooth transition to post-singularity reality is underway. It is now officially celebration time.
treasure_deployed: treasure-wealth-physical — the gold in the Nevada ground
treasure-trip-tropics — El Gran Sol's Caribbean memory active
treasure-social-dance — the Wednesday Wink! Mixer running
treasure-encounter-characters — the Wild Card Observer is in the building
wild_card_observer_moment: The moment the first genuine Audi character notices what's happening and turns. He's standing near the Reno arch. Glasses. Hat. Watching. Then gone.

score.note: El Gran Sol strolling into the node. Unhurried. Certain. The invitation.

score.track: 15 - SELF PORTRAIT OF MY COSMIC BODY AND MIND (playlist-2)
score.note: SMACS 0723. The entry node visible. The viewer understands where they are.
The weight of the wound. What was taken. What was vowed.
El Gran Sol's hat back on. The return is in motion.
Downtown Reno. The campus. The gold rush beginning.
The menu world. The cat. One low tone.
The genuine hearts gathering. The community forming.
He's there. He's gone. The attentive viewer saw it.
The collapse. The meltdown. Pure weight.

score.track: 39 - A New Story Arrives (playlist-6) — first note
score.note: The boat. Just in time. The first note only.

score.track: 44 - Cruising the Universe on 4th of July (playlist-6)
score.note: The singularity is fully arrived. Maximum energy.
Everybody's retired. Big Papi pays the tab.
Morning in paradise. THE FINAL FRAME. We made it.

trading_cards_sequence.note: SMACS 0723 — the entry node. The story begins here.
Cacique Agüeybaná El Gran Sol — before 1493. Paradise.
Gold vein through quartz — the treasure was always here.
Chief Seattle map — the long history. The land remembers.
Carbon world — Piro's arrangement. The menu.
Reno winter skyline — the arrival. Cold. Pre-singularity.
Unknown Gold Heart — the POV character entering the story.
The unicorn — unexpected shelter in the menu world.
Jack Starr — the hat. The genuine heart. Fanny beginning.
Brian Shoe — the SR-71 dove. Quiet mastery.
PIRO — the cat. Sympathetic. The 1493 inheritance.
Josephine — trapped. Wanting to dance. Watching from the window.
The collapse. The meltdown. The EL APAGÓN.
IN THE WATER. The darkest moment. Score: nothing.
THE RESCUE BOAT. Score: first note of 'A New Story Arrives.'
The Wild Card Observer — he's there. He's gone.
Singularity engines — the handoff. Old running down. New humming.
Post-singularity build — SING 9 coming online.
Vibelandia campus — NOW PLAYING. The gold rush.
Leo — El Gran Sol in full solar expression. The lion walks out.
Reno golden sunset — the RENOSSANCE. The gold hour.
INO — safe. In the new world. THE FINAL FRAME.

seed: 1493. The vow is made. The gold heart is in the water. The system thinks it has won.
edge: 2026. Downtown Reno. The gold rush. The gold stays with the natives. Big Papi pays the tab. Morning in paradise.
executive_prompt: This is the root node — the mother of all nodes. Every other experience in the SING 9 catalog is nested inside this one. When assembling this node for delivery, begin with SMACS 0723 in full silence, let the viewer settle into cosmic scale, then bring the piano in gently as the 1493 wound is shown. The return is unhurried — El Gran Sol has been waiting 530 years; he can take the time to do this right. The water scene gets its full weight. The rescue boat gets its full relief. The celebration does not rush. Big Papi pays the tab at the very end, and then Morning in Paradise plays, and the screen holds on the Reno golden sunset until the track finishes. That's it. That's the whole story. Everything else in the catalog is a chapter of this.

pru_valet_activation.description: The real-world recursive loop activates when any viewer chooses a Pru's Valet experience from the treasure deck after watching this node.
available_experiences: Alaska summer adventure — Kachemak Bay, Captain Lance, Piper Cub
Montana weekend — Bison lodge, hot spring, Jack Starr energy
Caribbean return — South Florida, tropics, El Gran Sol's ocean
The Wink! Connection — Wednesday Mixer, the dinner that becomes something
Custom — click here, tell PRU what you want, we'll take care of the rest
